Documentation.long_help: This filter can convert GPS data (longitude/latitude/height) to cartesian coordinates in order to 'wrap' the data around a globe.
This filter samples the terrain height at the latitude/longitude of a point and adjusts the point's height accordingly
Documentation.short_help: Adjust point position by terrain height

Documentation.long_help: This filter can extract data from precipitation point sets read by a Kronos reader depending on the precipitation type of each point.
Documentation.short_help: Extract data based on the type of precipitation

Documentation.long_help: This filter can interpolate group points and return the data.
Documentation.short_help: This filter can interpolate group points and return the data

Documentation.long_help: This filter can limit temperature data points to a specified temperature range
Documentation.short_help: Limit temperature data to a specified temperature range

DoubleVectorProperty.label: Temperature Range
DoubleVectorProperty.name: TemperatureRange
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The upper and lower temperature limits respectively

Documentation.long_help: This filter can limit wind data points to a specified wind speed range
Documentation.short_help: Limit wind data to a specified speed range

DoubleVectorProperty.label: Wind Speed Range
DoubleVectorProperty.name: WindSpeedRange
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The upper and lower wind speed limits respectively

Documentation.long_help: This filter can accumulate weather data over time by either accumulating values or calculating their average.
This filter can fill in missing data points using linear interpolation.
This filter can extract data from twitter point sets read by a Kronos reader depending on the author and keywords.
Documentation.short_help: Extract data based on the author or keywords

IntVectorProperty.name: AuthorMatchingMode
IntVectorProperty.label: Author matching mode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property indicates the matching mode for authors.

StringVectorProperty.name: Authors
StringVectorProperty.label: Authors (comma-separated)
StringVectorProperty.information_property: Authors whose tweets should be extracted

StringVectorProperty.name: Keywords
StringVectorProperty.label: Keywords (comma-separated)
StringVectorProperty.information_property: All tweets containing at least one of these keywords will be extracted

DoubleVectorProperty.label: Retweet Number Range
DoubleVectorProperty.name: RetweetNumberRange
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The upper and lower retweet number.

Documentation.long_help: This filter can extract data from flight point sets read by a Kronos reader depending on the airlines, flight distance, start and destination airport.
Documentation.short_help: Extract data based on the airlines, flight distance, start and destination airport

IntVectorProperty.name: AirlineMatchingMode
IntVectorProperty.label: Airline Matching Mode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property sets the matching mode for the airlines.

StringVectorProperty.name: OriginAirportCodes
StringVectorProperty.label: Origin airport codes (comma-separated)
StringVectorProperty.information_property: Set the airport code of the origin airports

StringVectorProperty.name: DestinationAirportCodes
StringVectorProperty.label: Destination airport codes (comma-separated)
StringVectorProperty.information_property: Set the airport code of the destination airports

DoubleVectorProperty.label: Flight Length Range
DoubleVectorProperty.name: FlightLengthRange
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The upper and lower flight length limits respectively

Documentation.long_help: Use the SciVis Filter to solve every problem related to the SciVis-Contest 2014 with MIPAS Data

DoubleVectorProperty.label: Time
DoubleVectorProperty.name: TimeRange
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The upper and lower time limits respectively

DoubleVectorProperty.label: Profile
DoubleVectorProperty.name: ProfileRange
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The upper and lower Profile limits respectively
